name: Squirtle

attacks.name: Dredge Up
attacks.effect: You may search your discard for a Water Pokemon and put it on top of your deck.

attacks.name: Water Gun
attacks.effect: Deal 10 more damage for each Water Energy attached to this Pokemon not used to pay for this attack's cost, up to 20.

flavor: Some Squirtle just want to hang out on the beach.
